extendedInfo.description: Remote control your FRITZ!Box and find out who called at home. Show call list and FRITZ!Box phone book, Switch on/off your answering machine and reconnect/reboot FRITZ!Box.Simple setup:The new wizard lets you easily setup BoxToGo and supports MyFRITZ!, DynDns and  free "BoxToGo DynDns".Requirements:AVM FRITZ!Box 3270, 3370, 6320, 6340, 6360, 6840, 7112, 7141, 7170, 7240, 7270, 7320, 7330, 7360, 7390 or 7570 with firmware from xx.04.87.Take a look at BoxToGo Pro:- call monitor displays calls immediately- Free phone calls with Callthrough- Skype calls- Switch on/off diversions- Switch on/off WiFi and WiFi guest access- Multiple FRITZ!Box support- Shows photos and names from contacts in call list- Determine caller name via reverse lookup- WakeOnLan- Play voice messages (wav)- Display fax messages (pdf)- 13 widgets for nearly all featuresCompare all features between free and pro:http://www.boxtogo.de/comparison.phpVisit http://www.boxtogo.de for FAQs, forum and videos or contact me directly: boxtogo@almisoft.de or +49 (0) 30 70206375

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Nice app to use also when youre not home.
reviews.author: Henk Broekhuizen

reviews.title: Great compatibility with 7170
reviews.comment: The best free app to control my FB 7170, easy to setup and to connect. Gut gemacht! A+
reviews.author: A Google User
